data.name: House Builder VR
data.detailed_description:
CHECK OUT OTHER GAMES

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1244630/House_Builder/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1905980/Farmers_Father__Farm_Hunt_and_Survive_365_days_of_occupation/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1430760/Aquarist__build_aquariums_grow_fish_develop_your_business/


About the Game

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1430760/Aquarist__build_aquariums_grow_fish_develop_your_business/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1137750/Farmers_Life/


Let us take you on a trip to various spots on the globe and experience true architectural variety. You will try to build a mud hut in Africa, an igloo in the Arctic, a Canadian house, a log cabin in Siberia, traditional house made of bricks, air bricks or concrete and many, many more… Every house consists of hundreds elements you need to match according to rules of construction. Now in VR to fully dive into the action!

See how the construction technologies differ from each other. Learn how to apply proper materials and procedures during building process.
Build houses brick by brick, element after element, down from the foundations and up to the roof. Learn different structures of buildings, construction materials, their features and properties. Build simple constructions made of primitive materials, but also ultramodern buildings featuring the latest technological discoveries.

Use various tools depending on the situations and requirements. Improve your skills, use better equipment to be able to build complex structures quickly and efficiently.

House Builder now in VR gives you a unique chance to fully experience builder's life. It was never so real like that!
ADD IT TO YOUR WISHLIST NOW!

data.short_description: Travel around the world and through the ages to build iconic designs! Beware unpleasant temperatures and dangerous fauna! Now in VR to fully immerse in the adventure...
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: I5-6500 / Ryzen 5 3400G
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 / RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 21 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: GPU: GTX 2060 / RX 5600 XT
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 6GB / RX 480 GB 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 21 GB available space
